Public Class methods

new(io=nil)

Initializes a new Base given the file descriptor, mode and options. (see open_io for details on what io is opened for a given file descriptor)

If mode contains an ‘s’, then the Base will be initialized in strio mode where the underlying IO will be a StringIO. In this case the fd will be used as the string to initialize the StringIO.

Standard options for Base include:

nil_value:the value written to file for nils, and converted to nil on read (default ’ ’)
max_gap:the maximum gap size used by Offset (default 10000)
max_chunk_size:the chunk size used by Offset (default 1M)
open(fd=nil, mode="r", options={}) {|ab| ...}
